Welcome to Small Naval Battle! Here is a step-by-step guide on how to play:
 1. Game objective:
 Find and sink all hidden ships on the board before running out of moves.
 2. How the board works:
 The board consists of a grid of buttons. Each button represents a cell where there may or may not be a ship.
 3. How to play:
 - Tap a cell to "shoot" at that position.
 - If you hit a ship, the cell will turn red and you will score a hit.
 - If there is no ship, the cell will turn blue, indicating a missed shot.
 - Each tap counts as a move.
 4. Counters:
 - Moves: How many cells you have tapped.
 - Hits: How many ships you have found.
 - Remaining ships: How many ships are yet to be discovered.
 5. End of the game:
 When you find all ships, the game ends and you can see a summary of your moves and hits.
 6. Tips:
 - Think carefully before shooting to avoid wasting moves.
 - Use logic to deduce where ships might be.
 Have fun and good luck sinking the ships!
